title: WCAS MATH 300-0-31 Foundations of Higher Mathematics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The emphasis in this course is on theory and proofs. It is designed to prepare students to take 300-level mathematics courses such as 321 and 331 as sophomores. Linear algebra, similar to 240, but in greater depth. Topics include vectors, inner product, systems of linear equations, and linear transformations.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Book of Proof, 2nd ed
Richard Hammock
Ingram
ISBN: 978-0989472104
http://www.people.vcu.edu/~rhammack/BookOfProof/.

Students can order a hard copy from Amazon or Barnes and Noble or download the pdf for free.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: May not be taken for credit after 320-1, 321-1, 330-1 or 331-1 without prior departmental consent.

subject: MATH
